name: SEVEN Career Coaching
description:
We are London's leading career coaching company. Our approach is fresh and dynamic, our team are highly sought experts vetted and drawn from the best London has to offer.

As a full-service coaching consultancy, we are focused on empowering dynamic and modern organisations, millennials, leaders, high-performers, career changers, entrepreneurs, and graduates.

We work privately with individuals and deliver leadership development programmes, change management executive coaching and training and bespoke team coaching within organisations.

team.title: CEO, Founder
team.name: Evelyn Cotter
team.bioHtml: We are London's leading career accelerator, providing progressive results-based coaching for ambitious professionals wanting more.

team.title: CEO, Founder
team.name: Evelyn Cotter
team.bioHtml: We are London's leading career accelerator, providing progressive results-based coaching for ambitious professionals wanting more.

jobs.title: Social Media Remote Intern
jobs.description:
Are you obsessed with online marketing, Instagram and Youtube?

Would you love a chance to manage a brand’s instagram to bring it to the next level?

Do you think you have the skills, the love of learning and passion to bring us to a few hundred thousand followers and get us that coveted blue tick?


We’re looking for a remote intern, who has every Instagram app helper + knows every hack out there and loves learning, if you don’t know something, you Youtube it… obviously! 

You study influencers and watch what they use and you’re always one of the first to use the new features on Instagram or on any social you’re using.

**You’re a huge fan of Gary V** and you’ve just been waiting for an opportunity like this to cut your teeth and showcase what you can do.



**We don’t need someone to create content ** we need a optimiser. But we want someone who will shape our strategy to supercharge our brand.

We want more people to know about our brand and how we help people, globally.

Scheduling content, strategising + optimising are what we’re after.

We use LATER and we expect you to know what that is, and if you don’t, have already taken tutorials before we speak to you. 



This is an unpaid opportunity.

Results will tell us what’s next.

IF you crush it, we could become your first client.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Are you obsessed with online marketing, Instagram and Youtube?

Would you love a chance to manage a brand’s instagram to bring it to the next level?

Do you think you have the skills, the love of learning and passion to bring us to a few hundred thousand followers and get us that coveted blue tick?

We’re looking for a remote intern, who has every Instagram app helper + knows every hack out there and loves learning, if you don’t know something, you Youtube it… obviously!

You study influencers and watch what they use and you’re always one of the first to use the new features on Instagram or on any social you’re using.

You’re a huge fan of Gary V and you’ve just been waiting for an opportunity like this to cut your teeth and showcase what you can do.

*We don’t need someone to create content * we need a optimiser. But we want someone who will shape our strategy to supercharge our brand.

We want more people to know about our brand and how we help people, globally.

Scheduling content, strategising + optimising are what we’re after.

We use LATER and we expect you to know what that is, and if you don’t, have already taken tutorials before we speak to you.

This is an unpaid opportunity.

Results will tell us what’s next.

IF you crush it, we could become your first client.
